amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of the Army to update the principles and guidelines used by the Army Corps of Engineers in formulating, evaluating, and implementing water resource projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 110-100 to strike section 2036 of the legislation and replace it with language directing the Secretary of the Army to update the principles and guidelines that the Army Corps of Engineers uses in the formulation, evaluation, and implementation of water resources projects. The amendment would require the Secretary to consult with other agencies and the public in developing the new principles and guidelines.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
